CustomField.formula: IF( OR( RecordType.Name ='Metabolicos', RecordType.Name ='Epilepsia', RecordType.Name ='Metabolicos_y_Epilepsia' ), Categoria_Nicho__c, IF( OR( RecordType.Name ='Alergia', RecordType.Name ='Pediatricos', RecordType.Name ='Pediatricos General' ), Categoria_Ped_Aler__c, Categoria_Nicho__c ) )
CustomField.label: Categoria
